name: Hairy Barbary
description:
Once upon a time, there was a castle, with 100 princesses.

But one day, the Royal Guard, those who are supposed to protect the nobles, kidnapped these princesses.

"This is terrible, what do we do?", the king nervously asked his advisors.

"All our guards have betrayed us, who is left to fight for us?"

"Sir, have you ever heard of Hairy Barbary?",  answered one of his advisors. "He's a barbarian, but he's willing to fight anyone for money."

"Then he is our only hope."
